snippet: Roman Roth’s 2010 Virgin Berry Riesling is smooth, balanced, concentrated and zippy, and it has a low alcohol content.
abstract: Howard G Goldberg Long Island Vines column reviews riesling wines by Roman Roth (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: Roman Roth’s 2010 Virgin Berry Riesling is smooth, balanced, concentrated and zippy, and it has a low alcohol content.

headline.seo: From Roman Roth, a Smooth Riesling
headline.main: From Sure Hands, a Smooth Riesling
headline.print_headline: From Sure Hands, A Smooth Riesling
